text: We had a wonderful experience at Harry's! Dave provided attentive and friendly service, while chef Calvin catered specifically to my dietary needs with delicious, beautifully presented dishes. The chill atmosphere and outstanding service made our visit truly memorable. Highly recommend!

I have to say that the food is good. I enjoyed all of them. We arrived at about almost 9 pm. The waitress told us that the kitchen is closing at 9.30 pm so we made our orders. After the food arrived, she came to us again and said The place is closing at 10 pm. At almost 10 pm, she came over again and told us they were closing. No smile, just a short sentence "we are closing". We know that you are closing and we are finishing up. Please train your staff to be more understanding and be more polite. I know the staff is going home soon or they need to stay after 10 pm to watch the dishes. Her manner gave me an awkward situation because I brought my guests here for a quick dinner. Anyway, the place is located in the mall. It is convenient.

Awesome service and food. Was served by Dave, very friendly guy!

Had the nachos and boomz! Every single layer is coated with cheese / sauce. Very flavourful. üòöüëåüèª

I had an amazing experience at this place! The service crew is fantastic‚Äîfriendly and attentive, making sure everything was perfect. The ambiance is incredibly inviting, providing a chill atmosphere that's perfect for relaxing and enjoying good times with friends. Highly recommend it for anyone looking to unwind and have a great time!
